title: (x) Looking for fonts with calligraphic ornaments - various {gang}
content:
I don’t know where exactly to post this, so, moderators, please feel free to move it.

Can anyone point me out nice font faces (I would rather prefer free ones) which features calligraphic ornaments?
author: souljacker

comments.content: Look at Minion Ornaments, Linotype Decoration Pi One, Type Embellishments One for starters. You can probably find them all at fontshop.com or myfonts.com. I don’t feel like searching for the links.

Calligraphic ornaments can be found in font form, digitized clip-art, etc.

It also depends on what period or style of calligraphic flourish or ornament you are looking for.

Try looking at [**Ornament fonts**](http://web.archive.org/web/20091009055326/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/ornaments/index.htm) available at Typoasis.

——————————————————-  
Yes, I’m old, but I can still flourish!
There are some nice ornaments in the Illustrator CS Symbol Library, Decorative Elements.
Not free but Dalliance from Emigre has some wonderful swash elements
